name.value: Medication Process 9 3.0.0-beta - MedicationUse - Serve - Scenario 9.x - target CheckContent - JSON Format

description.value: Scenario 9.x - KWAL Medicatiegegevens MGB script 9
Resource.id for MedicationStatement 1

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_GDS').id

description.value: Resource.id for MedicationStatement 2

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_LOS').id

description.value: KWAL Medicatiegegevens MGB script 9
Test server to serve MedicationStatement resource(s) representing MP9 building block MedicationUse
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.all( $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') or $this.resource.id.exists())

description.value: Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl

expression.value: Bundle.entry.where(fullUrl.exists() and resource.id.exists()).all($this.fullUrl.endsWith($this.resource.id))

description.value: Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(Coding)).all(system.exists() and code.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(CodeableConcept)) .all(coding.display.exists() or text.exists() or extension.exists())

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(Reference)).all(display.exists() or extension.where(url = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/data-absent-reason').exists() or extension.where(url = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-nullFlavor').exists())

description.value: Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(Identifier)).all((system.exists() or type.exists()) and value.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.

expression.value: Bundle.total.exists() implies (Bundle.total.toInteger() <= Bundle.entry.where(search.empty() or search.mode = 'match').count())

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.

expression.value: Bundle.link.where(relation = 'self' and url.exists()).exists()

description.value: Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.all( $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') or $this.resource.id.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl

expression.value: Bundle.entry.all($this.fullUrl.endsWith($this.resource.id) or $this.fullUrl.startsWith('urn:'))

description.value: Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2020.01/FHIR_IG#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.
Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension).

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(CodeableConcept)).all(coding.display.exists() or text.exists() or extension.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 2 MedicationStatement resource(s).

expression.value: Bundle.entry.where(resource.is(MedicationStatement)).count() >= 2

description.value: Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 3 entries. (Consists of 2 MedicationStatement and 1 Medication resources.)

expression.value: Bundle.entry.count() >= 3

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR MedicationStatement that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 MedicationStatement with properties: contains a resource with identifier = MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_GDS

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_GDS').count() = 1

description.value: MedicationStatement resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_GDS').id.exists()

description.value: Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationUse2'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').meta.profile.where($this = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationUse2').exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RenderedDosageInstruction' with .valueString with a value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RenderedDosageInstruction').value.where($this is string).hasValue()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationUse2.Prescriber' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationUse2.Prescriber').value.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AsAgreedIndicator' with .valueBoolean 'true'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AsAgreedIndicator').value.where($this is boolean) = true

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier' with .valueIdentifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier').value.where($this is Identifier).where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationUse2.Author' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationUse2.Author').value.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .identifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').identifier.where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .status 'active'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').status = 'active'

description.value: Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '422979000' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').category.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '422979000' and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .medicationReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').medication.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').subject.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .effectivePeriod with .start and .end

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').effective.where($this is Period).where(start and end).exists()

description.value: Contains .dateAsserted

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').dateAsserted.exists()

description.value: Contains .informationSource with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').informationSource.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .derivedFrom with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-ResourceCategory' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '422037009' and .display, and with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').derivedFrom.where(extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-ResourceCategory').value.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '422037009' and display) and (reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .derivedFrom.extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-ResourceCategory' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '422037009' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-15 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').derivedFrom.where(extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-ResourceCategory').value.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '422037009' and display).exists()).exists()

description.value: Contains .derivedFrom with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-15 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').derivedFrom.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosage with .route with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and .code '9' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBGDS-id}').dosage.where(route.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and code = '9' and display)).exists()

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR MedicationStatement that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 MedicationStatement with properties: contains a resource with identifier = MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_LOS

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_LOS').count() = 1

description.value: MedicationStatement resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_SCRIPT9_MGB_LOS').id.exists()

description.value: Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationUse2'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').meta.profile.where($this = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationUse2').exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationUse2.Prescriber' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationUse2.Prescriber').value.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AsAgreedIndicator' with .valueBoolean 'false'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AsAgreedIndicator').value.where($this is boolean) = false

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier' with .valueIdentifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier').value.where($this is Identifier).where(system and value).exists()

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationUse2.Author').value.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .modifierExtension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-StopType' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '385655000' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').modifierExtension.where(url = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-StopType').value.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '385655000' and display).exists()

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').identifier.where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .status 'on-hold'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').status = 'on-hold'

description.value: Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '422979000' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').dateAsserted.exists()

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(id = '${mp-MedUse2-mp9-MBH300SCRIPT9MGBLOS-id}').informationSource.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails
